h2_title: Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast Boss Fight and Guide
content: When you enter the arena, on the other side, you'll see another frozen-over archway. You can actually bait the beast to break this down and escape inside of it. While he's still trying to attack you, you can use Thrust Stance to get him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bishui_Golden-Eyed_Beast.md', within the main section titled 'Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast', specifically from the subsection 'Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When you enter the arena, on the other side, you'll see another frozen-over archway. You can actually bait the beast to break this down and escape inside of it. While he's still trying to attack you, you can use Thrust Stance to get him.
